name: LD51 - Sort Me Right Out
description:
The Game

A customer sorting game made in Godot.

Every 10 seconds a new round starts, each round brings more customers to sort for your boss. Occasionally, you’ll be able to go to the shop for things to help you sort out. 

Art/Music All art created by me Music from the game Wilmots Warehouse Sound effects from youtube and a friend Software Godot Aseprite Controls

- Click and drag a customer into the right pipe

- Escape to pause

Links

LDJam Link - https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/sorting-customers-game
